analysis.description:
CitizenOneCoin.cap (/unique_chucks/44/0x6daa2ca19196291f162e11174f21da3c64b83094.sol#353) shadows:
	- CappedToken.cap (/unique_chucks/44/0x6daa2ca19196291f162e11174f21da3c64b83094.sol#329)

Reentrancy in CitizenOne.finalize (/unique_chucks/44/0x6daa2ca19196291f162e11174f21da3c64b83094.sol):
	External calls:
	- token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/44/0x6daa2ca19196291f162e11174f21da3c64b83094.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/44/0x6daa2ca19196291f162e11174f21da3c64b83094.sol)

CitizenOne.CitizenOne (/unique_chucks/44/0x6daa2ca19196291f162e11174f21da3c64b83094.sol#486-504) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(publicityAddress,10000000e18) (/unique_chucks/44/0x6daa2ca19196291f162e11174f21da3c64b83094.sol#500-504)

CitizenOne.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/44/0x6daa2ca19196291f162e11174f21da3c64b83094.sol#521-537) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/44/0x6daa2ca19196291f162e11174f21da3c64b83094.sol#535)

CitizenOne.finalize (/unique_chucks/44/0x6daa2ca19196291f162e11174f21da3c64b83094.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/44/0x6daa2ca19196291f162e11174f21da3c64b83094.sol)
